english.segment1: Night falls. Like a vulture. On it's prey. Wicked culture. Black Pitch. And getting darker. It's time to spark ourselves in this hour
english.segment2: When they hide. In the shadows of night. Light em up. Light em up. In the dark. Let's ignite. We're the ones
english.segment3: When they hide. In the shadows of night. Light em up. Light em up. In the dark. Let's ignite. We're the ones
english.segment4: You're laid bare. Foolish mortal. Dark deeds. Mass inferno. Covert crimes. Closet Portal. Your skeletons are burning eternal
english.segment5: When they hide. In the shadows of night. Light em up. Light em up. In the dark. Let's ignite. We're the ones
english.segment6: When they hide. In the shadows of night. Light em up. Light em up. In the dark. Let's ignite. We're the ones
